recipes.title: Vegan Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A hearty and flavorful soup made with lentils, vegetables, and spices.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with quinoa, mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumber, and a lemon vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and easy stir-fry loaded with colorful vegetables and tofu, seasoned with soy sauce and garlic.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy and flavorful risotto made with Arborio rice, mushrooms, onions, and vegetable broth.

recipes.title: Vegan Chili
recipes.description: A spicy and hearty chili made with beans, tomatoes, peppers, and spices, with no meat or dairy products.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple and delicious toast topped with mashed avocado, salt, pepper, and optional toppings like tomatoes or red pepper flakes.
